ndvi.desc: From USGS: "NDVI is used to quantify vegetation greenness and is useful in understanding vegetation density and assessing changes in plant health."

enhancedVegetationIndex.desc: Another vegetation index; from USGS: "EVI corrects for some atmospheric conditions and canopy background noise and is more sensitive in areas with dense vegetation."

savi.desc: From USGS: "SAVI is used to correct Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) for the influence of soil brightness in areas where vegetative cover is low."

msavi.desc: From USGS: "MSAVI minimizes the effect of bare soil on the Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index (SAVI)."

ndmi.desc: From USGS: "NDMI is used to determine vegetation water content."

nbr.desc: From USGS: "NBR is used to identify burned areas and provide a measure of burn severity."

nbr2.desc: From USGS: "NBR2 modifies the Normalized Burn Ratio (NBR) to highlight water sensitivity in vegetation and may be useful in post-fire recovery studies."
